mapper.sql: id, account_number, transaction_type, amount, currency, description, category, status, created_at, updated_at
mapper.update: UPDATE t_r_transaction SET account_number = #{accountNumber}, transaction_type = #{transactionType}, amount = #{amount}, currency = #{currency}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.account_number, t1.transaction_type, t1.amount, t1.currency, t1.description, t1.category, t1.status, t1.created_at, t1.updated_at FROM t_r_transaction t1 join (select id from t_r_transaction LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset})t2 on t1.id = t2.id order by t1.id
